Title: Cortez
Writer: Cheryl Nichols, Cheryl Nichols, Arron Shiver, Arron Shiver
Actors: Arron Shiver, Cheryl Nichols, Drago Sumonja, Judith Ivey
Plot: After a canceled tour, flailing musician Jesse Lirette seeks out an old flame in a small town in New Mexico. When an arrogant attempt at inserting himself into her family fails, he must confront the mistakes of his past on his own.
